createSeries.startAndEndDateExplanation: Quickly create a lecture series by only defining titles and timing. Add lecture contents later. Start by specifying start and end of at least one lecture, that you would like to repeat weekly:
createSeries.seriesEndDateExplanation: Now define a date on which you would like the repeated lectures to end:

updateNameConfirmation.message: Some existing lectures follow the default naming format (e.g., "Lecture 1"). Would you like to update the numbering of these lectures according to the new order?
